snippet: Mott Haven, in the nation’s poorest congressional district, is rapidly developing, and a restaurant in a former piano factory built in 1886 is an example.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Charlies Bar & Kitchen, local bar and restaurant in Mott Haven neighborhood of Bronx that has weathered early stages of gentrification.
lead_paragraph: Mott Haven, in the nation’s poorest congressional district, is rapidly developing, and a restaurant in a former piano factory built in 1886 is an example.

headline.main: Charlies Bar & Kitchen Is a Pioneering Dining Option in a Poor Bronx Neighborhood
